Articles.Content:
Its innovative, It cant make orbit, Its very maneuverable, Its a VTOL, Its the E-35 Starbreaker, a craft that has been in development for about 2 months... (i had to figure out how to make it maneuverable and make it a vtol... still trying to figure out a way to give it more fuel...) http://imgur.com/a/qyuyu. there is a interstellar variant but that one is still in development so it may be awhile before its ready for combat...

 

Edited December 7, 2015 by Endevours
Cute - but you might wanna reduce the strut count - very draggy in 1.0.5.

39 minutes ago, Foxster said:

Cute - but you might wanna reduce the strut count - very draggy in 1.0.5. 

it falls apart without the struts at supersonic speeds...
going to try to release a craft download, somehow.
